Title: 4. Singapore International Festival of Arts 2025
Address / Location: Various, including Drama Centre Theatre, Victoria Theatre, SOTA Studio Theatre
Description: 16th May-1st Jun  View this post on Instagram A post shared by Singapore International Festival of Arts (@sifa_sg)  The Singapore International Festival of Arts (SIFA) 2025 is back with a cool theme, “More Than Ever,” and it’s all about celebrating Singapore’s arts scene and future. This year’s festival is huge on local talent, featuring a record number of 15 new Singaporean works. SIFA is covering a variety of performing arts from theatre to dance. You can check out the SIFA Pavilion at Bedok Town Square for free live performances, including the opening show inspired by Bedok’s vibes. There’s also Little SIFA at Empress Lawn with fun programmes for families and kids, like a puppet version of Animal Farm. Admission: Free & ticketed events Venue: Various, including Drama Centre Theatre, Victoria Theatre, SOTA Studio Theatre Dates: 16th May-1st Jun Full list of SIFA 2025 programmes
